job.title: Data Engineer
job.description: Work at a company where people truly believe in what theyre doing At Wonderlic we combine our sciencebased assessment background with the best talent to innovate the way modern preemployment screening is leveraged by the recruiting industry Our mission is to expertly combine IO psychology machine learning and artificial intelligence to ensure applicants are able to find their best jobs Wonderlic provides the most trusted scientifically validated assessments for sophisticated HR teams looking to identify top applicants and accurately predict onthejob performance potentialbrbrAs a peoplefirst company were constantly on the lookout for the best and brightest minds to propel Wonderlic forward Do you strive for excellence Are you driven by the desire to make positive changes in the world you live in Are you passionate about your craft Join Wonderlic in shaping the future of our organization Wed be happy to have youbrbrstrongJob Title strongData EngineerbrbrstrongLocation strongFullyremote position with infrequent voluntary travel into the Vernon Hills IL officebrbrstrongSupervisory Responsibilitiesstrong No direct reportsbrbrstrongReports to strongManager AI InnovationbrbrstrongOverview brbrstrongWonderlic is looking for a brand new Data Engineer and we hope itll be you Why Because youre ready to expand Wonderlics competitive edge working closely with our talented team of data scientists to deliver cuttingedge user experiences Youre confident in your ability to identify relevant opportunities where streamlined data pipelines and a single reliable source of truth can make a difference for our organizations emerging data strategybrbrAs a Wonderlic Data Engineer youll partner with stakeholders to internalize the problem domain uncovering opportunities where various data solutions are appropriate Your passion for data creative problemsolving and ownership will empower you to deliver these data products endtoend from design to launch Through technical excellence you will play a significant role in enhancing our processes and improving our toolkitsbrbrstrongEssential Functions amp Competencies neededbrstrongulliDesigns and builds dataETL pipelines to support data science use casesliliEstablishes and maintains a data warehouse andor data lake comprised of data from numerous sources including appropriate cataloguing and governance of the stored dataliliTranslate business needs into reliable scalable data solutionsliliDevote time to learning new and relevant tools processes and technologiesliliDemonstrates a desire to learn about ML models currently in production as well as the deployment strategies used to get them thereliliConduct common and specialized performance analysis of regression and classification ML models in productionliliAnticipates the challenges associated with ML models in production and designs efficient elegant solutions to these eg retraining strategies monitoring alertsliliPartners with manager and other stakeholders to discuss implementation and prioritizationliliResponds promptly to opportunities and challenges with a constructive positive mindset and sense of urgencybrliulstrongRequired Education and ExperiencebrstrongulliBABS in Computer Science Computer Engineering Math Statistics Economics or related STEM field or equivalent experiencelili2 years of experience building schemas for and interacting with SQL and NoSQL eg MongoDB databaseslili2 years of experience building data visualizations and monitoring dashboards using Tableau preferred SisensePeriscope or another similar softwarelili1 years of experience using cloud computing services eg AWS Google CloudliliPreferred 1 years of experience building and maintaining data warehousesliliPreferred 1 years of experience building and maintaining data lakesliliExperienced Python software developer with 1 years experience using Python for data processingETL experience with JavaScript andor R a plusliliExperience using professional software engineering best practices for the full development life cycle including coding standards code reviews version control management and testingliliPreferred Familiarity with the theory and application of ML algorithmsbrliulstrongWhat we offerbrstrongulliCompetitive salaryliliCompetitive Paid Time Off PTO  21 days PTO to start accruing lili8 paid holidays and 2 extra floating holidaysliliA paid company shutdown week from December 26 to December 31liliMedical dental and vision group insuranceliliCompany paid life and longterm disability insuranceliliPaid Parental and Primary Caregiver Leave after 1 year of employmentlili401k with matching after 1 year of employmentliliHighly collaborative innovative and fun work environmentbrliulstrongAffirmative Action PlanEqual Employer Opportunity AAPEEO Statementstrong Wonderlic is proud to be an equal employment opportunityaffirmative action employer Here diversity is
